name: Nancy Hernandez
text: Lastnight was the second time I’ve ordered from here and it is amazing! Great customer service and great food quality. I am very pleased and this has become my favorite pizza place!!

name: Tyron Granderson
text: I am a frequent visitor of this location and I have seen the changes in employment throughout several months for the better. The customer service has improved as wells as remaining urgent with online orders. Thank you to the management team and staff for your efforts, keep up the good work!

name: Rose Vanda
text: 5/5 Stars, Amazing, Also great delivery, the STAFF are EXCEPTIONAL thry all need raises the staff even are bilingual. The pizza, salad, bread all so delicious! Hungry Howie support breast cancer awareness. We LOVE HUNGRY HOWIES

name: James Williamson III
text: Great food and friendly staff. The pepperoni cheese bread was amazing

name: Sha'Quiel Alston
text: Pizza is a good deal for the price. Very satisfying.  The customer service was good as well. I actually had a coupon and this pizza was free! I really have no complaints.

name: Brooke Marie
text: first time eating here and it was very good.  Really liked all the different options for the crust, I ended up choosing the garlic herb. While it was very good, it was too strong for me and I think I’d pick the butter next time I order from …More

name: Jimmy Harris
text:
Pizza is ok but not great. If you are having a public event it is fine but if you are celebrating something special, I would not choose this.
Edit: You should try a slightly different recipe and try to make the pizza more savory

name: marhyssa powell
text: Pizza is always yummy. We had the cinnamon bread. OMG so so yummy! They are fast and friendly. Thank you!

name: Chris Partin
text: My wife and kids just love their pizza.

name: Bettie Royster
text: I got the lunch special It's so good(mini pizza & soda) for $5.34. Today I also got the wings mild they were delicious.

name: Amber Pitts
text: Love this HH location! We have ordered from here several times and have always had a good experience. There was only one time that our order was past the delivery time but the food is always correct. They never forget the dipping sauce …More

name: LESLIE JONES
text: Also good pizza great service

name: rich daugherty
text: good service; nice outside table

name: Wanda Paige
text:
Food is good pizza is ok
Staff is really nice

name: MB Brady
text: We ordered through Grub Hub @ Hungry Bodies.  Even though Grub Hub is a third p a try they were still willing to help us!!  Grub Hub did refund our money due to their error.  Keep in mind if you order through Grub Hub they place your order, may not be what you select online.

name: John Beward
text: We have been missing Hungry Howie's since moving from Florida. So glad we found this place which keeps the flavored crust alive! By far, our favorite pizza and always at a great price!

name: Kyle none
text: Good pizza quick service

name: Rob Fletcher
text: Great quality for the fair price. The Howie rolls are delish also. One of my stops before I head to work.

name: Harold Henderson
text: A very lovely experience with the best pizza staff I have come across in all my years. The clerk was very animated and made checking out a joy. If you are visiting Raleigh please consider stopping in for the best ordering experience of your life.

name: Hostile-Takeover
text: Delicious pizza. Inexpensive also. 2 topping for $8. Can’t beat that. Someone said it’s greasy but I dispute that. Grease is based on the toppings and I got pepperoni with bacon, the two most greasy and it wasn’t as greasy as I expected. …More

name: rdblk84
text: I waited over a hour for my pizza and they messed my order up. I'm done with this place!

name: Red kiss
text: The best pizza. We been searching for a taste in pizza we found Howie’s to have a fast delivery and good clean drivers. The pizza was hot on arrival and tasted fresh.

name: David Stroz
text: My friend and I ordered a free pizza here yesterday after getting a promotion in the mail. The pizza is good, but really greasy. Prices are also a bit on the higher side for what you get at $10-12 per large pizza. …More

name: Dylan Lucas
text: Great service! The guy at the register patiently helped while I made up my mind. Unfortunately, the pizza itself isn't that great. Think, Little Caesars.

name: Charlie McGuinness
text: The food overall was good, although it took an hour to make from the time I ordered and they forgot the ranch seasoning on the pizza. I was a pickup order, so i waited for 20 min at the location, but the manager was hospitable, offering a drink while I waited.

name: Elicia Mims
text: This place is a contender for the top pizza spot in my list.  I love their pizza - great cheese, not too much sauce, and a delicious crust.  I have eaten there a couple dozen times and never been disappointed. Would definitely recommend this place to everyone of my friends.

name: Kiara Chauntelle
text: Love the Salads & the pizza is good too. Coming from NY it's hard to find good  pizza. No comparison to NY still but I like it

name: Ginger S.
text: Great prices, fast service, food always tastes great! This is my 7 year olds favorite pizza place!

name: Felicia Yarborough
text: Love, love, love the flavored crust! The salads are pretty good, too. Con: the restaurant is hard to see from Glenwood---it's tucked away in the corner of a small strip mall behind Haverty's.

name: MichelleandRick Gatt
text: Battle for Eire

name: Daniel Owns
text: Travis, the manager told me to look hard and I would see that this crust was indeed flavored... I want your opinion; does this look like Cajun flavored crust? I’ve been ordering hungry Howie’s for close to 6 years... this may very well be my last time.

name: Kenyatta Clark
text: Love the different flavors of crust and service is great

name: Christy Lucia
text: Best "fast food" pizza in Raleigh, hands down. I'd pay more for them over Papa Johns, Pizza Hut or Dominos any day of the week... but they always have amazing coupons so I never have to! Everything is always hot and fresh and made …More

name: John S. Fore
text: This was my first HH experience. I'll definitely be back. That crust is fantastic!

name: Jean Joseph
text: Just the right amont of toppings

name: Vanessa B
text: Great customer service.  Thats never been an issue !!! Pizza was decent. Little slack on the tomato sauce but it was still good. Im more of a saucy gal!

name: Marcel Planter
text: Nice staff and good customer service

name: Brian Ross
text: always great taste and best crust flavors

name: Kayla Woodard
text:
I'm a delivery only customer. Food is always great service is crazy fast. Anytime there has been an issue (they were out of boneless once) they added a free boneless to my next order. Customer service is awesome.
Thanks!

name: Michelle Bonventre
text:
I love their The Works pizza!! It is the best.  I've had it a few times and it has never disappointed me.  It's always fresh and hot.
I usually get delivery and the guys are great.  They bring it to me at work with a smile on their face.

name: Uniqueka Jenkins
text: Good pizza. Good customer service. Reminds me a my childhood visits to the bowling alley in Michigan.

name: Claire Gravenhorst
text: The pizza here is so good!! the only reason I ever ordered from this place is because they dropped a flyer at my door but now it is my favorite pizza place. the flavored crusts are amazing (Butter is the best) and their Cheese-steak pizza …More

name: David Hertzberg
text: I love it when they give me the works.

name: Slhl S77785
text: Horrible service, look behind the counter while you are there too. None of the crew acknowledged I even walked in. There were too busy cutting up. Never again.

name: Robyn S
text: Super friendly staff

name: andrea coulter
text: Love the food here

name: Jonathan OToole
text: Order from here sometime once or twice a month if we don't feel like cooking.  Good pizza and great customer service and delivery drivers are very happy and go luck .

name: Emilio Gonzalez
text: Good food. Nice services.

name: Don Turnage
text: Great customer  service & deals, average pizza

name: Brian Ross
text: ready on time friendly service

name: Raven Ellerbe
text: I was introduced to their flavored crust a year ago after domino's started that God awful garlic parmesean flavor on their crust and was pleasantly suprised. I don't really experiment with food but I'm glad I did. Then pizza hut stopped …More

name: Dione Porter
text: AWESOME pizza and ready in no time!!

name: Dh r
text: Great food and prices.

name: Jesi L
text: My favorite pizza place! Staff is always friendly and my pizza is always delicious!

name: Antoinne P.
text: Pizza, wings and bread sticks I dream about in my sleep!!!The staff was extremely helpful and a joy to work with along with the fresh amazing pizza, thanks guys!!

name: Terri Umphlett
text: Great stuff! I did find the pizza a little on the salty side, but overall, great cheese bread and pizza!

name: Cassandra Langley
text: I was very impressed an pleased with my order that was taken by a nice young lady named "brianna" who took her time an was really kind. I will be ordering alot more at this location. 🤗

name: Janice Joyner
text: First trying them. I was hesitant at first because I was told it wasn't that good. Decided to try for myself and glad I did. My order was cooked to perfection. Enjoyed every slice. Will continue to order when I crave pizza.

name: Jonathan Evans
text: Warm friendly greeting when we walked in. Clean and oooohhh the aroma, YUM!!!

name: Lyric Jackson
text: Wish we had one closer to garner, nc

name: TJ Tyree
text: Cheap delicious pizza with flavored crust. I love this place. Staff is really cool too

name: Terry Sutton
text: Great food terrible customer service. Manager Travis has the worst attitude. Better to order online.

name: Jan-Michael Robinson
text: Food is super good...price is good...service i A-1

name: Amanda Leavelle
text: They have the best gluten free pizza, regular pizza and chicken wings! Something for everyone!

name: Ralib
text: The pizza tasted great, but the crust was overly seasoned and salty.

name: priyanka
text: They had many types of pizza. Also had a salad bar on certain hours. Very delicious

name: Star Centurion
text: As far as popular franchises go, if you want to make a safe bet that your food will arrive hot, on time or actually ahead of time, and the drivers aren't braindead and don't know your address, do yourself a favor and order here. I've ordered 10+ times from this location and never had a problem, and the food is really great.

name: William Hill
text: Fast and delicious!!  Second time eating here and I enjoyed on both occasions. Need more in Illinois  preferably closer to Chicago.  You got my vote and I will give you my neighborhood so you may put one there...lol!

name: Robert Korstian
text: Great Pizza, and I'm sure that their sandwiches are very good too. I haved loved Hungry Howie's for years.

name: Jessica Wilson
text: Hungry howies puts a great spin on pizza this place is amazing plus they have stiffed crust!!!!

name: Candace Seegers
text: Good pizza, I like the flavored crust options.

name: Leigh Williams
text: Best pizza small price!

name: Nicole Blanker
text: The BBQ Chicken and the Howie Special are amazing! #addicted

name: Elizabeth
text: This was my 1st time ordering from Hungry Howie's and it was DELICIOUS! The toppings were fresh, the cheese was great quality, and the crust was so yummy! I know my family will be ordering from them again!

name: Yvette Mitchell
text: Love the food and prices. Love the flavored crust

name: Matviy Bomze
text: Great food and even better service.

name: Cheryl Peacock
text: Not a fan of this pizza place.

name: Rhiannon Bryan
text: Love the pizza,  love the customer service!

name: Marvena B
text: I love the food and the staff are always very friendly

name: Kipp Glazier
text: Quick cheap good

name: Andy Newsome
text: Reasonable priced and quick

name: Jason Kelley
text: Great place to go for late pizza even midweek. Delivery was prompt pizza delicious.

name: Crystal
text: Great customer service and food always tastes good.

name: Manny Robles
text: This is the hands down worst deep dish I have ever ordered.  The crust of the pizza was completely black and burned.  When I called the manager she claimed this was a normal toasted crust.  I guess toasted means burnt to a crisp to her.

name: Boomhauer Loudinmilk
text: Howies not hungry after he eats here!!!

name: Stephon Jeffries
text: I was broke

name: Clay Fulks
text: Great pizza and quick turn around time for lunch!

name: Phillip Ray
text: Called for a delivery and was told I HAD to pay with credit card because they thought I'd stiff them if I paid with cash. To hell with that. Stupid mf.

name: Rhiannon Graye Raitz
text: Best delivery pizza around, Imho. We've been giving them our patronage for years. Every now and then you'll get an off delivery with side items, but their pizza is always on point.

name: Maurice Wilson
text: I love the pizza and the wing order from there quite often and never had a problem

name: Marshall Evans
text: Good gluten free option.

name: Zee Cyphor
text: Some of the best fast pizza in Raleigh.  Sweet discounts and promotionals.

name: Terry Bedwell
text: There subs are out of this world.

name: Abhi S
text: Delicious Pizza, my all time favourite.

name: Zanadia D.W.
text: Oh ya bring it So 😋

name: Stylist Sanders
text: Best pizza and wings

name: Dante McNeill
text: Horrible customer service, even if their pizza is actually good! The Glenwood Ave location has lost a customer for life & that includes 5 of my Co-workers who were waiting for our order to be delivered, but never was.

name: David Chang
text: Really great pizza

name: brunda brundavan
text: I love their pizzas

name: Celeste Goddard
text: Oh so yummy 😋 I order pizza just for the crust!

name: Joe Lapatra
text: Best pizza in the world

name: Vaani Chockalingam
text: Nice place

name: Pote Pr
text: Good Pizza

name: Kristy Williams
text: Awesome Pizza

name: Shanavia A
text: Delicious pizza

name: King Rex
text: Was good

name: Sterling Smith
text: Good food

name: Who_8lse Loving
text: Great pizza

name: Crissy Perez
text: Excellent customer service

name: Marvena Barksdale
text: Love this place

name: Amanda LaBaff
text: Always enjoy a good Howie's!

name: Karla Steward
text: Great Pizza!!

name: Joshua Souther
text: We go here a little too much, but the butter cheese crust is worth it. We've never had to wait longer than they promise, and delivery is prompt.

name: Greg Novak
text: Ordered on line, was quick and easy.

name: Reuben Gradsky
text: Yum! Flavored Crust

name: Andrew P. Dyer
text: Great pizza

name: Chason Cox
text: Cheap, good, fast.

name: william partin
text: The Best pizza on this planet

name: J Williams
text: Hungry Howies is affordable but mediocre. Like every Pizza chain ever.

name: Briana Wilson
text: Favorite pizza by far

name: Sky
text: Will not answer phone after midnight

name: andre mat
text: Great pizza and Great choices of pizza crusts!
